items.content_html: Say It Your Way is a lightweight, customizable React input field component for managing gender identities and pronouns. Designed to be flexible, inclusive, and easy to integrate, it allows users to express themselves authentically while keeping overhead minimal. Perfect for applications needing accessible and diverse gender input options.

Perfect for applications needing accessible and diverse gender input options.

items.content_html: Pear is a lightweight and easy-to-learn programming language designed for efficient file operations, data manipulation, and general-purpose scripting. With its simple syntax and powerful built-in functions, Pear streamlines the coding experience for automation and small applications.

items.content_html: The Memory Storage Library is a simple and lightweight TypeScript library for storing data in memory. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, getting, removing, and clearing key-value pairs in memory. This library is ideal for use cases where you need temporary storage without the overhead of a database or local storage.
items.title: obi-tec/memory-cache: The Memory Storage Library is a simple and lightweight TypeScript library for storing data in memory. It provides an easy-to-use API for setting, getting, removing, and clearing key-value pairs in memory. This library is ideal for use cases where you need temporary storage without the overhead of a database or local storage.
